title: Mobile Microlearning Based on Anatomy and Physiology Laboratory Manuals

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic biology and medical terminology
context.additional_context: Acquisition of core anatomy and physiology concepts through lab manual access using personal devices, with practical competency reinforcement via project-based assessments

learning_goals: The structure and functions of major human organ systems can be accurately explained using visual materials from laboratory manuals
Physiological experimental procedures can be independently performed at least 80% through mobile device-provided protocols
Experimental result analysis reports can be written by referencing feedback manuals, and at least three improvement points can be derived through peer evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
